name: Dance of Death
text: Hero Action: Make the following 3 attacks in order: - Deal 1 damage to an enemy. - Deal 2 damage to an enemy. - Deal 3 damage to an enemy.

flavor: "We should be safe here." -- Black Widow
name: Safe House #29
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Safe House #29 and choose a [[Preparation]] card in your discard pile → add that card to your hand.

name: Grappling Hook
text: Hero Interrupt: When you reveal a treachery, discard Grappling Hook → cancel the effects of that reachery and discard it.

name: Widow's Bite
text: Hero Response (attack): After a minion enters play, discard Widow's Bite → deal 2 damage to that minion and stun it.

name: Agent Coulson
text: Response: After Agent Coulson enters play, search your deck and discard pile for a [[Preparation]] card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: Counterintelligence
text: Max 1 per player. Interrupt: When any amount of threat would be placed on the main scheme, discard Counterintelligence → prevent 3 of that threat.

name: Rapid Response
text: Max 1 per player. Hero Response: After an ally you control is defeated, discard Rapid Response → put that ally into play from your discard pile and deal 1 damage to it.
